findings.title: DoS Risk on the liquidation operation
findings.description: The liquidator liquidating all users will traverse all the user ledger, which means that the transaction will eventually fail because the liquidation instructions exceed the block gas limit.

findings.title: Liquidation operation update debt exception
findings.description: The liquidator clearing the debt does not update the COLLATERAL_PERCENTAGE and DEBT_PERCENTAGE ledgers of other accounts.

findings.title: [AERO-03] Collateral calculation error
findings.description: No decimals calculation is performed when converting stable-coin value to collateral value. Eventually the amount of collateral will be wrong.

findings.title: Debt handling error in execute_redeem option
findings.description: Incorrectly updates the TOTAL_DEBT_AMOUNT ledger with the remaining amount of the last user who partially redeemed, causing debt ledger update errors for all users.

findings.title: Update liquidity threshold error
findings.description: Incorrectly updates ratio to 100 when user partially redeemed and adds users who partially redeemed to the exclusion list, resulting in users losing collateral.

findings.title: Lose decimals in liquidity calculation
findings.description: The calculation of low-value coins is inaccurate due to the lack of decimals.

findings.title: [AERO-07] The execute_liquidate_troves operation abnormally updated the TOTAL_COLLATERAL_AMOUNT ledger
findings.description: The protocol fee is not subtracted when the TOTAL_COLLATERAL_AMOUNT ledger is updated, making the actual TOTAL_COLLATERAL_AMOUNT value larger.

findings.title: Collateral of risky user handling error in execute_redeem option
findings.description: Not all risky assets are excluded when processing risky users' assets. Instead, the always unchanged old_total_debt_amount is used to update risky assets.
